thread.section_title: SaratogaWine.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SaratogaWine.com | www.saratogawine.com
thread.title: Teresa in Colorado
thread.title_full: SaratogaWine.com reviewed by Teresa in Colorado

author: Teresa in Colorado
title: Teresa in Colorado
text: I was looking for a picticular wine, and Saratoga was one of the few who carried it. Their price was the best out there too. Was easy to order, and they shipped it right away. Was pleased with service and know where I'll look first next time!
